div.style: width: 100%; height: 100%; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; color: white; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: 土壤湿度: 65% | 养分含量: 78%
